title: Home Is Here At Sommerset Apartment's
posting_body: ['Sommerset Apartments in Vacaville, CA', "Whether you're looking for a cultural experience, out door adventure, sporting event or just a day lounging by the pool, the classic charm of Sommerset Apartment Homes puts you right where you want to be.", 'Come explore the Sommerset lifestyle.', 'Sommerset Apartment Homes is centrally located between San Francisco and Sacramento, 40 minutes away from taking in a Giants or Kings Game!', 'Have an elegant and cultural experience by taking a stunning ride on the Napa Wine Train.', 'Staying close to home is also entertaining in beautiful Downtown Vacaville.', 'The City of Vacaville takes pride in supporting our troops that are stationed at Travis AFB that is located only 7 minutes away.', 'Sommerset offers 1 and 2 bedroom homes with the luxury of a washer and dryer included.', 'Each residence boasts of gracious picture windows, private terraces and thoughtfully designed modern kitchens.', 'The considerable amount of wardrobe space allows you to be high style with The Vacaville Premium Outlets just a stones throw away.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 56', 'OR Text', '56', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 620 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- View', '- Individual Hot Water Heaters', '- High Speed Internet Available', '- Window Coverings', '- Pets Welcome', '- Air Conditioning', '- Washer Dryer', 'In Unit', '- Cable/Satelite Available', '- Two Tone Paint', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Storage Space', '- Private Balconies/Patios', '- Pantries', '- Breakfast Bar', '- Dishwasher', '- Ceiling Fan(s)', '- Walk', 'In closets', 'Community Amenities', '- Pets Allowed', '- Fitness Center', '- Swimming Pool', '- Minutes to Shopping, and Travis AFB', '- Online Payments Accepted', '- Professional Landscapes', '- Covered Parking', '- Close to Shopping, Dining, Bus Routes and Much More!', '- Visitor Parking Available', 'Pet Policy', '2 pets per home, Cat or Dog, 35 Lb. weight limit.', 'Fees and Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call with questions.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Income requirement is 2.5x rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday: 9:00AM-4:30PM', 'Tuesday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Thursday: 9:00AM-4:30PM', 'Friday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sommerset Apartments', '591 Peabody Rd, Vacaville, CA, 95687', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management
